document_data.name: Easel Gifford
document_data.mainbody: '''Easel Gifford''', commonly called '''Easel of Amn''', was a [[human]] [[paladin]] of [[Torm]] hailing from [[Amn]] and the leader of [[Code Helm]] in [[Realmspace]] in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: Based in the third ring of [[Glyth]], Easel led Code Helm in launching attacks on [[illithid]]s, both on the planet below and against their [[spelljammer]]s.
document_data.Possessions: Easel wore at all times a suit of [[full plate mail]] forged from [[platinum]] and polished to perfection, and also had a ''[[ring of protection]] +3''. Most notably, he wielded the "Fist of Obedience", as he called itâ€”actually a ''[[longsword]] +3''. The sword was not only sentient, it communicated telepathically with Easel. No one could lie in Easel's presence, for the sword would sense it and inform him of the deception.
